subject: Re: My Ebay Price For The Mini-Box
author: psfponies
full_text:
Bruce 

Thanks for clearing that up for me I was just confused. I thought 
maybe there was another Mini Box available that was more money. 

I would love to bid on your Mini Box but I dont want to get caught 
up in the EBay freezy. I can fully understand your wanting to get 
some of your investment back. Who knows maybe you get all your money 
back the people are bidding on it paid over $50.00 for a $24.99 
Radio Shack radio. :)


Kay


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Hi everyone,
> 
> A few people have seen my ebay listing and commented about the 
price 
> listed.
> 
> Ebay will not allow you to change a description after the item has 
> been listed. They do however allow you to add and amending 
statement.
> 
> Which I have done In Big Bold Red Letters, the price listing was a 
> mistake. I am certainly not trying to misrepresent the item or 
make a 
> profit on it.
> 
> I have also lowered the reserve price on it as a result of the 
> mistake.
> Believe me I will be taking a loss on the box.
> 
> I have already sent my apologies to Rick Moran from Paranormal 
> systems.
> 
> And now extend my apologies for the mistake to anyone that was 
> interested in it.
> 
> The reason for selling the MB was not the money, it was the guilt 
of 
> having this excellent piece of equipment go without the attention 
it 
> deserves. And the hopes that someone or some group can utilize it 
> more than myself.
> 
> But I could not as much as I would have liked to, give it away.
> My intention was to get back at least a decent amount of my 
> investment.
> 
> I hope no one gets the wrong idea and thinks ill of me.
> 
> Bruce
>
